definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Tabb is the first woman to referee a world snooker championship final.
sentences.chinese: 塔普是第一位在斯诺克世锦赛决赛中担当裁判的女性。

sentences.english: My first interest in snooker occurred when I was seven years old.
sentences.chinese: 我最初对斯诺克产生兴趣是在七岁的时候。

sentences.english: In the course of our research, we spoke with a number of professional snooker and billiards players.
sentences.chinese: 我们在研究中和几位职业斯诺克和台球运动员谈话。

sentences.english: I spent a hour playing snooker with my schoolmate in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 中午在老校和同学打了一个小时的斯诺克。

sentences.english: What were your highlights of the 2010 Betfred. com World Snooker Championship?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得2010年世界斯诺克锦标赛的亮点是什么？

sentences.english: Snooker is a big sport in China.
sentences.chinese: 斯诺克在中国是个大型的运动。

sentences.english: Ronnies' top game is better than anyone who has ever played snooker.
sentences.chinese: 罗尼最佳状态时比任何一个斯诺克选手都要好。

sentences.english: A good temperament is obviously a very good trait to have in a snooker player.
sentences.chinese: 一名优秀的斯诺克球手，良好的心理素质不可或缺。

sentences.english: Former snooker player Alex Higgins has died at the age of 61.
sentences.chinese: 前斯诺克选手阿历克斯希金斯享年61岁。

sentences.english: He's the new wonder boy the sport's been looking for.
sentences.chinese: 他是斯诺克球坛一直寻找的新一代奇才。

sentences.english: Back for team Jumpers and Snooker tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 回到团队跳线和斯诺克明天。

definition: Wimbledon Championships (tennis)/abbr. for 溫布爾登網球公開賽|温布尔登网球公开赛[Wen1 bu4 er3 deng1 Wang3 qiu2 Gong1 kai1 sai4]
jade pot for cold water/curling (sport)/curling puck
